Projectile Trajectory Calculator

This console application was developed in C# to deepen my understanding of the mathematics behind trajectory physics. It accurately calculates the horizontal and vertical trajectories of an object based on its mass, speed, and launch angle. However, please note that the current implementation does not consider factors such as drag and wind resistance.
